name: harvest-moon-web-game
description: A web-based Harvest Moon farming simulation game

scripts.dev: lsof -ti:8000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && python3 -m http.server 8000 & sleep 2 && open http://localhost:8000
scripts.setup: node generate-placeholders.js && echo 'Harvest Moon Game Setup Complete! Run npm start to begin development.'

author: Claude Code Assistant
